ActCanada Pension Plan
Old Age Security Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS AND THE OLD AGE SECURITY REGULATIONS by making it possible to apply for CPP and OAS benefits over the Internet and by allowing for some evidentiary flexibility in determining the age and marital status of applicants.
